post.text: There are just 63 days left in this election. Watch live as Hillary hits the trail in Tampa to talk about keeping our country safe and building an economy that works for everyone.

comment.author: Erik
comment.text: For smart voters who actually care about policies, issues and Hillary stances -and not about what the MSM has made you believe: https://www.hillaryclinton.com/issues/

replies.author: Tyler
replies.text: FBI says Clinton lied to America. Caught now in more lies with FBI -Clinton interview. Another 15,000 emails found along with 15 mobile devices that were destroyed, some with hammers says a Clinton aide. It is a fact that if elected she will still just be a criminal. Sad days for America.
